name: Prediction Market Aggregator
description: Aggregated prediction market data from Polymarket, Kalshi, and more. Real-time odds, volume, and market signals. $0.05/query via x402.
longDescription: Aggregate prediction market data from Polymarket, Kalshi, and other major platforms. Get real-time odds, trading volume, market signals, and historical trends. Query by topic, category, or specific market. Returns structured JSON with current probabilities, volume data, price history, and cross-platform comparisons. Ideal for trading agents, research, forecasting, and decision-making automation.
whyMobileProxy: Prediction market platforms (especially Polymarket) rate-limit and geo-block datacenter IPs. Metaculus requires residential-looking traffic for reliable API access. Mobile proxies ensure consistent data retrieval across regions and bypass anti-bot measures that block automated trading signal aggregation.

competitors.name: Polymarket API (direct)
competitors.notes: Single platform only, no aggregation, rate limited

competitors.name: Metaculus API (direct)
competitors.notes: Single platform, limited fields, pagination required

competitors.name: Manifold Markets API
competitors.notes: Play money markets, limited real volume data

competitiveContext.ourAdvantage: Cross-platform aggregation (Polymarket + Metaculus) in a single x402 query. No API keys, no signup, normalized schema across platforms. $0.005/query via micropayment.
